message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll find valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but my budget allows me to only consider offers within the range of $800000 to $900000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
